document_title: Ethmoid sinusitis: Causes, symptoms, location and prevention
subsection_content:
MSc.BSc.CKI Truong Tan Phat emphasized that if ethmoid sinusitis is not treated, the infection can spread deeply into nearby organizations, leading to complications ranging from affecting health to causing disability. lifelong or in the worst case, death.
Complications of ethmoid sinusitis can occur such as:
Bulging eyes, double vision or blindness;; Invasive infection leads to meningitis;; Optic neuritis.
